statements: SELECT * FROM routes ORDER BY route_id DESC
SELECT origin_station, destination_station FROM routes WHERE distance > 100
SELECT route_id, origin_station, destination_station FROM routes WHERE time_required < 2.5 ORDER BY route_id
SELECT route_id, distance FROM routes WHERE origin_station='New York' AND destination_station='Los Angeles'
SELECT SUM(distance) AS total_distance FROM routes
SELECT * FROM routes WHERE route_id = 1
SELECT origin_station, destination_station FROM routes WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY time_required DESC
SELECT route_id, origin_station, distance FROM routes WHERE time_required < 5 AND destination_station = 'New York' ORDER BY distance ASC
SELECT AVG(distance), MAX(time_required) FROM routes GROUP BY origin_station
SELECT * FROM routes WHERE origin_station LIKE 'Los%' AND destination_station LIKE '%City'
SELECT * FROM train_routes;
SELECT route_name, route_distance FROM train_routes ORDER BY route_distance DESC;
SELECT station_name, station_location FROM train_stations WHERE station_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM train_stations WHERE station_location LIKE '%city%';
SELECT route_id, route_name FROM train_routes WHERE route_distance > 100;
SELECT route_id, route_name, route_distance FROM train_routes WHERE route_distance > 100 ORDER BY route_distance DESC
SELECT * FROM train_stations WHERE station_location LIKE '%City%' ORDER BY station_name ASC
SELECT route_name, COUNT(station_id) AS num_stations FROM train_routes JOIN train_stations ON train_routes.route_id = train_stations.station_id GROUP BY route_name ORDER BY num_stations DESC
SELECT MAX(route_distance) AS max_distance FROM train_routes
SELECT station_name, station_location FROM train_stations WHERE station_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM stations
SELECT station_name, station_id FROM stations ORDER BY station_name DESC
SELECT * FROM routes WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY distance ASC
SELECT station_name, route_id FROM stations JOIN routes ON stations.station_id = routes.departure_station_id
SELECT route_id, MIN(distance) AS shortest_distance FROM routes GROUP BY route_id ORDER BY shortest_distance ASC
SELECT * FROM stations WHERE station_id = 1;
SELECT station_id, station_name FROM stations ORDER BY station_name DESC;
SELECT route_id, departure_station_id, arrival_station_id, distance FROM routes WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY distance ASC;
SELECT schedule_id, route_id, departure_time, arrival_time FROM train_schedule WHERE route_id = 2 ORDER BY departure_time DESC;
SELECT MAX(distance) AS longest_distance FROM routes;
SELECT * FROM Station;
SELECT station_id, station_name FROM Station WHERE station_id = 1;
SELECT route_id, origin_station_id, destination_station_id FROM Route WHERE distance_km > 100;
SELECT train_name, capacity FROM Train WHERE capacity >= 200;
SELECT schedule_id, route_id, train_id, departure_time, arrival_time FROM Schedule WHERE departure_time < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Station;
SELECT station_name FROM Station ORDER BY station_id DESC;
SELECT route_id, origin_station_id, destination_station_id, distance_km FROM Route WHERE distance_km > 100 ORDER BY distance_km ASC;
SELECT train_id, train_name, capacity FROM Train WHERE capacity >= 200 ORDER BY train_name;
SELECT schedule_id, route_id, train_id, departure_time, arrival_time FROM Schedule WHERE departure_time > '2022-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY departure_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM routes ORDER BY distance_km DESC;
SELECT start_station, end_station, distance_km FROM routes WHERE distance_km > 100 ORDER BY start_station ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM stations;
SELECT train_id, train_name, capacity FROM trains WHERE capacity >= 200 ORDER BY train_name;
SELECT passenger_name, seat_number FROM passengers WHERE train_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM routes ORDER BY distance_km DESC, route_id ASC;
SELECT start_station, end_station, distance_km FROM routes WHERE distance_km > 100;
SELECT station_name, city FROM stations WHERE city='New York' OR city='San Francisco' ORDER BY station_name ASC;
SELECT train_name, capacity FROM trains WHERE capacity >= 200 ORDER BY train_name DESC;
SELECT passenger_name, seat_number FROM passengers JOIN trains ON passengers.train_id = trains.train_id WHERE train_name LIKE 'Express%' ORDER BY passenger_name ASC;
